00002 #include "Mutils.h"

00021 static
00022 int left_cyclic(double x[], int ldx, int j, int k,
00023                 double cosines[], double sines[])
00024 {
00025     double *lastcol;
00026     int i, jj;
00027 
00028     if (j >= k)
00029         error(_("incorrect left cyclic shift, j (%d) >= k (%d)"), j, k);
00030     if (j < 0)
00031         error(_("incorrect left cyclic shift, j (%d) < 0"), j, k);
00032     if (ldx < k)
00033         error(_("incorrect left cyclic shift, k (%d) > ldx (%d)"), k, ldx);
00034     lastcol = (double*) R_alloc(k+1, sizeof(double));
00035                                 /* keep a copy of column j */
00036     for(i = 0; i <= j; i++) lastcol[i] = x[i + j*ldx];
00037                                 /* For safety, zero the rest */
00038     for(i = j+1; i <= k; i++) lastcol[i] = 0.;
00039     for(jj = j+1; jj <= k; jj++) { /* columns to be shifted */
00040         int diagind = jj*(ldx+1), ind = (jj-j) - 1;
00041         double tmp = x[diagind], cc, ss;
00042                                 /* Calculate the Givens rotation. */
00043                                 /* This modified the super-diagonal element */
00044         F77_CALL(drotg)(x + diagind-1, &tmp, cosines + ind, sines + ind);
00045         cc = cosines[ind]; ss = sines[ind];
00046                                 /* Copy column jj+1 to column jj. */
00047         for(i = 0; i < jj; i++) x[i + (jj-1)*ldx] = x[i+jj*ldx];
00048                                 /* Apply rotation to columns up to k */
00049         for(i = jj; i < k; i++) {
00050             tmp = cc*x[(jj-1)+i*ldx] + ss*x[jj+i*ldx];
00051             x[jj+i*ldx] = cc*x[jj+i*ldx] - ss*x[(jj-1)+i*ldx];
00052             x[(jj-1)+i*ldx] = tmp;
00053         }
00054                                 /* Apply rotation to lastcol */
00055         lastcol[jj] = -ss*lastcol[jj-1]; lastcol[jj-1] *= cc;
00056     }
00057                                 /* Copy lastcol to column k */
00058     for(i = 0; i <= k; i++) x[i+k*ldx] = lastcol[i];
00059     return 0;
00060 }
00061 
00062 static
00063 SEXP getGivens(double x[], int ldx, int jmin, int rank)
00064 {
00065     int shiftlen = (rank - jmin) - 1;
00066     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 4)), nms, cosines, sines;
00067 
00068     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 0, ScalarInteger(jmin));
00069     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 1, ScalarInteger(rank));
00070     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 2, cosines = allocVector(REALSXP, shiftlen));
00071     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 3, sines = allocVector(REALSXP, shiftlen));
00072     setAttrib(ans, R_NamesSymbol, nms = allocVector(STRSXP, 4));
00073     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 0, mkChar("jmin"));
00074     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 1, mkChar("rank"));
00075     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 2, mkChar("cosines"));
00076     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 3, mkChar("sines"));
00077     if (left_cyclic(x, ldx, jmin, rank - 1, REAL(cosines), REAL(sines)))
00078         error(_("Unknown error in getGivens"));
00079     UNPROTECT(1);
00080     return ans;
00081 }
00082 
00083 SEXP checkGivens(SEXP X, SEXP jmin, SEXP rank)
00084 {
00085     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 2)),
00086         Xcp = PROTECT(duplicate(X));
00087     int  *Xdims;
00088 
00089     if (!(isReal(X) & isMatrix(X)))
00090         error(_("X must be a numeric (double precision) matrix"));
00091     Xdims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(X, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00092     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 1, getGivens(REAL(Xcp), Xdims[0],
00093                                      asInteger(jmin), asInteger(rank)));
00094     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 0, Xcp);
00095     UNPROTECT(2);
00096     return ans;
00097 }
00098 
00099 SEXP lsq_dense_Chol(SEXP X, SEXP y)
00100 {
00101     SEXP ans;
00102     int info, n, p, k, *Xdims, *ydims;
00103     double *xpx, d_one = 1., d_zero = 0.;
00104 
00105     if (!(isReal(X) & isMatrix(X)))
00106         error(_("X must be a numeric (double precision) matrix"));
00107     Xdims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(X, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00108     n = Xdims[0];
00109     p = Xdims[1];
00110     if (!(isReal(y) & isMatrix(y)))
00111         error(_("y must be a numeric (double precision) matrix"));
00112     ydims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(y, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00113     if (ydims[0] != n)
00114         error(_(
00115             "number of rows in y (%d) does not match number of rows in X (%d)"),
00116             ydims[0], n);
00117     k = ydims[1];
00118     if (k < 1 || p < 1) return allocMatrix(REALSXP, p, k);
00119     ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, p, k));
00120     F77_CALL(dgemm)("T", "N", &p, &k, &n, &d_one, REAL(X), &n, REAL(y), &n,
00121                     &d_zero, REAL(ans), &p);
00122     xpx = (double *) R_alloc(p * p, sizeof(double));
00123     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, &d_one, REAL(X), &n, &d_zero,
00124                     xpx, &p);
00125     F77_CALL(dposv)("U", &p, &k, xpx, &p, REAL(ans), &p, &info);
00126     if (info) error(_("Lapack routine dposv returned error code %d"), info);
00127     UNPROTECT(1);
00128     return ans;
00129 }

00132 SEXP lsq_dense_QR(SEXP X, SEXP y)
00133 {
00134     SEXP ans;
00135     int info, n, p, k, *Xdims, *ydims, lwork;
00136     double *work, tmp, *xvals;
00137 
00138     if (!(isReal(X) & isMatrix(X)))
00139         error(_("X must be a numeric (double precision) matrix"));
00140     Xdims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(X, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00141     n = Xdims[0];
00142     p = Xdims[1];
00143     if (!(isReal(y) & isMatrix(y)))
00144         error(_("y must be a numeric (double precision) matrix"));
00145     ydims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(y, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00146     if (ydims[0] != n)
00147         error(_(
00148             "number of rows in y (%d) does not match number of rows in X (%d)"),
00149             ydims[0], n);
00150     k = ydims[1];
00151     if (k < 1 || p < 1) return allocMatrix(REALSXP, p, k);
00152     xvals = (double *) R_alloc(n * p, sizeof(double));
00153     Memcpy(xvals, REAL(X), n * p);
00154     ans = PROTECT(duplicate(y));
00155     lwork = -1;
00156     F77_CALL(dgels)("N", &n, &p, &k, xvals, &n, REAL(ans), &n,
00157                     &tmp, &lwork, &info);
00158     if (info)
00159         error(_("First call to Lapack routine dgels returned error code %d"),
00160               info);
00161     lwork = (int) tmp;
00162     work = (double *) R_alloc(lwork, sizeof(double));
00163     F77_CALL(dgels)("N", &n, &p, &k, xvals, &n, REAL(ans), &n,
00164                     work, &lwork, &info);
00165     if (info)
00166         error(_("Second call to Lapack routine dgels returned error code %d"),
00167               info);
00168     UNPROTECT(1);
00169     return ans;
00170 }
00171 
00172 SEXP lapack_qr(SEXP Xin, SEXP tl)
00173 {
00174     SEXP ans, Givens, Gcpy, nms, pivot, qraux, X;
00175     int i, n, nGivens = 0, p, trsz, *Xdims, rank;
00176     double rcond = 0., tol = asReal(tl), *work;
00177 
00178     if (!(isReal(Xin) & isMatrix(Xin)))
00179         error(_("X must be a real (numeric) matrix"));
00180     if (tol < 0.) error(_("tol, given as %g, must be non-negative"), tol);
00181     if (tol > 1.) error(_("tol, given as %g, must be <= 1"), tol);
00182     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP,5));
00183     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 0, X = duplicate(Xin));
00184     Xdims = INTEGER(coerceVector(getAttrib(X, R_DimSymbol), INTSXP));
00185     n = Xdims[0]; p = Xdims[1];
00186     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 2, qraux = allocVector(REALSXP, (n < p) ? n : p));
00187     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 3, pivot = allocVector(INTSXP, p));
00188     for (i = 0; i < p; i++) INTEGER(pivot)[i] = i + 1;
00189     trsz = (n < p) ? n : p;     /* size of triangular part of decomposition */
00190     rank = trsz;
00191     Givens = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, rank - 1));
00192     setAttrib(ans, R_NamesSymbol, nms = allocVector(STRSXP, 5));
00193     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 0, mkChar("qr"));
00194     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 1, mkChar("rank"));
00195     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 2, mkChar("qraux"));
00196     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 3, mkChar("pivot"));
00197     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 4, mkChar("Givens"));
00198     if (n > 0 && p > 0) {
00199         int  info, *iwork, lwork;
00200         double *xpt = REAL(X), tmp;
00201 
00202         lwork = -1;
00203         F77_CALL(dgeqrf)(&n, &p, xpt, &n, REAL(qraux), &tmp, &lwork, &info);
00204         if (info)
00205             error(_("First call to dgeqrf returned error code %d"), info);
00206         lwork = (int) tmp;
00207         work = (double *) R_alloc((lwork < 3*trsz) ? 3*trsz : lwork,
00208                                   sizeof(double));
00209         F77_CALL(dgeqrf)(&n, &p, xpt, &n, REAL(qraux), work, &lwork, &info);
00210         if (info)
00211             error(_("Second call to dgeqrf returned error code %d"), info);
00212         iwork = (int *) R_alloc(trsz, sizeof(int));
00213         F77_CALL(dtrcon)("1", "U", "N", &rank, xpt, &n, &rcond,
00214                          work, iwork, &info);
00215         if (info)
00216             error(_("Lapack routine dtrcon returned error code %d"), info);
00217         while (rcond < tol) {   /* check diagonal elements */
00218             double minabs = (xpt[0] < 0.) ? -xpt[0]: xpt[0];
00219             int jmin = 0;
00220             for (i = 1; i < rank; i++) {
00221                 double el = xpt[i*(n+1)];
00222                 el = (el < 0.) ? -el: el;
00223                 if (el < minabs) {
00224                     jmin = i;
00225                     minabs = el;
00226                 }
00227             }
00228             if (jmin < (rank - 1)) {
00229                 SET_VECTOR_ELT(Givens, nGivens, getGivens(xpt, n, jmin, rank));
00230                 nGivens++;
00231             }
00232             rank--;
00233             F77_CALL(dtrcon)("1", "U", "N", &rank, xpt, &n, &rcond,
00234                              work, iwork, &info);
00235             if (info)
00236                 error(_("Lapack routine dtrcon returned error code %d"), info);
00237         }
00238     }
00239     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 4, Gcpy = allocVector(VECSXP, nGivens));
00240     for (i = 0; i < nGivens; i++)
00241         SET_VECTOR_ELT(Gcpy, i, VECTOR_ELT(Givens, i));
00242     SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, 1, ScalarInteger(rank));
00243     setAttrib(ans, install("useLAPACK"), ScalarLogical(1));
00244     setAttrib(ans, install("rcond"), ScalarReal(rcond));
00245     UNPROTECT(2);
00246     return ans;
00247 }
00248 
00249 SEXP dense_to_Csparse(SEXP x)
00250 {
00251     CHM_DN chxd = AS_CHM_DN(PROTECT(mMatrix_as_geMatrix(x)));
00252     R_CheckStack();
00253 
00254     /* cholmod_dense_to_sparse() in CHOLMOD/Core/ below does only work for
00255        "REAL" 'xtypes', i.e. *not* for "nMatrix".
00256        ===> need "_x" in above call.
00257 
00258        Also it cannot keep symmetric / triangular, hence the
00259        as_geMatrix() above.  Note that this is already a *waste* for
00260        symmetric matrices; However, we could conceivably use an
00261        enhanced cholmod_dense_to_sparse(), with an extra boolean
00262        argument for symmetry.
00263     */
00264     CHM_SP chxs = cholmod_dense_to_sparse(chxd, 1, &c);
00265     int Rkind = (chxd->xtype == CHOLMOD_REAL) ? Real_KIND(x) : 0;
00266 
00267     UNPROTECT(1);
00268     /* chm_sparse_to_SEXP() *could* deal with symmetric
00269      * if chxs had such an stype; and we should be able to use uplo below */
00270     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(chxs, 1, 0/*TODO: uplo_P(x) if x has an uplo slot*/,
00271                               Rkind, "",
00272                               isMatrix(x) ? getAttrib(x, R_DimNamesSymbol)
00273                               : GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00274 }

00277 /* FIXME: generalize this to  dense_band() : */
00278 
00279 SEXP ddense_band(SEXP x, SEXP k1P, SEXP k2P)
00280 /* Always returns a full matrix with entries outside the band zeroed
00281  * Class of the value can be dtrMatrix or dgeMatrix
00282  */
00283 {
00284     SEXP aa, ans = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(x));
00285     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym)),
00286         i, j, k1 = asInteger(k1P), k2 = asInteger(k2P);
00287     int m = adims[0], n = adims[1], sqr = (adims[0] == adims[1]),
00288         tru = (k1 >= 0), trl = (k2 <= 0);
00289     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym));
00290 
00291     if (k1 > k2)
00292         error(_("Lower band %d > upper band %d"), k1, k2);
00293     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00294         int i1 = j - k2, i2 = j + 1 - k1;
00295         for (i = 0; i < i1; i++) ax[i + j * m] = 0.;
00296         for (i = i2; i < m; i++) ax[i + j * m] = 0.;
00297     }
00298     if (!sqr || (!tru && !trl)) { /* return the dgeMatrix */
00299         UNPROTECT(1);
00300         return ans;
00301     }
00302     /* Copy ans to a dtrMatrix object (must be square) */
00303     /* Because slots of ans are freshly allocated and ans will not be
00304      * used, we use the slots themselves and don't duplicate */
00305     aa = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dtrMatrix")));
00306     SET_SLOT(aa, Matrix_xSym, GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym));
00307     SET_SLOT(aa, Matrix_DimSym, GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym));
00308     SET_SLOT(aa, Matrix_DimNamesSym, GET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00309     SET_SLOT(aa, Matrix_diagSym, mkString("N"));
00310     SET_SLOT(aa, Matrix_uploSym, mkString(tru ? "U" : "L"));
00311     UNPROTECT(2);
00312     return aa;
00313 }
